definitions.explanation_en: A proper noun, primarily used as a feminine given name, most famously associated with Agatha Christie, the renowned British mystery writer.
definitions.explanation_cn: 专有名词，主要用作女性名字，最著名的是与英国著名侦探小说作家阿加莎·克里斯蒂相关。
definitions.example_en: Agatha Christie wrote over 66 detective novels and is one of the best-selling authors of all time.
definitions.example_cn: 阿加莎·克里斯蒂创作了60多部侦探小说，是有史以来最畅销的作家之一。
